name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Torino Kingdom
keyMoments.description: Chopper awakens on Torino Kingdom after being sent there by Bartholomew Kuma. He finds himself in a giant bird's nest high in a massive tree, confused about what happened.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the beginning of Chopper's two-year journey on Torino Kingdom, where he will eventually train in advanced medicine.

keyMoments.title: Captured by Torino Kingdom Natives
keyMoments.description: The native inhabitants of Torino Kingdom capture Chopper and tie him up over a boiling pot, planning to make him into 'Tanuki hot pot'.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the initial hostility Chopper faces on the island before eventually befriending the natives and helping them.

keyMoments.title: Escapes Using Heavy Point
keyMoments.description: When giant birds attack the natives, Chopper transforms into his Heavy Point form to break free from his bonds and escape being cooked.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's survival instincts and his ability to use his Devil Fruit transformations in life-threatening situations.

relationships.description: Initially hostile, Shanba and the Torino Kingdom natives try to eat Chopper when he first arrives, but they will later become allies.

evolutionMoments.description: Shanba and the natives capture Chopper and try to make him into hot pot.

keyMoments.title: Awakens on Momoiro Island
keyMoments.description: Sanji regains consciousness on the pink paradise of Momoiro Island, believing he's woken up in heaven with a beautiful woman caring for him. The entire island is colored pink.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the beginning of Sanji's two-year nightmare on Momoiro Island, which will ultimately make him stronger and teach him new techniques like Sky Walk.
keyMoments.quote: Am I... in heaven? A beautiful angel saved me!

keyMoments.title: Discovers Tibany is an Okama
keyMoments.description: Sanji's hallucination breaks when Tibany hands him a dress, revealing that the 'beautiful woman' is actually an okama. Sanji recoils in horror at this discovery.
keyMoments.significance: The moment Sanji realizes he's not in paradise but in his personal hell, setting up the comedic running gag of his time on the island.

keyMoments.title: Chased by Kamabakka Kingdom
keyMoments.description: A group of okama from the Kamabakka Kingdom chase Sanji, trying to force him to wear a dress and join their community. Sanji runs in terror from what he considers his worst nightmare.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction to the Kamabakka Kingdom culture and the beginning of Sanji's character arc during the timeskip period.

relationships.description: Sanji initially hallucinates Tibany as a beautiful woman, but upon discovering the truth, sees Tibany and the other okama as antagonists trying to convert him.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji meets Tibany and discovers the okama community of Momoiro Island.

keyMoments.title: Secretly Feeds Luffy on Warship
keyMoments.description: Hancock hides Luffy in her quarters on Vice Admiral Momonga's warship and demands 100-kilogram meals five times a day to secretly feed him, risking her position to help him reach Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the depth of Hancock's devotion to Luffy and her willingness to risk everything for him, showing her complete character transformation.
keyMoments.quote: I require meals of at least one hundred kilos. Five times a day.

keyMoments.title: Fantasizes About Luffy
keyMoments.description: Hancock daydreams about hand-feeding Luffy and taking care of him, blushing and becoming flustered by her own romantic fantasies despite being alone.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hancock's vulnerability and humanizes her character, revealing how deeply her feelings for Luffy have changed her.

keyMoments.title: Petrifies Two Marines
keyMoments.description: When two Marines attempt to peek into her quarters, Hancock instantly turns them to stone using her Mero Mero no Mi powers, protecting Luffy's secret presence on the ship.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Hancock's dangerous nature and her determination to protect Luffy at all costs, even from her supposed Marine allies.
keyMoments.quote: How dare you peep on me. Turn to stone!

relationships.description: Hancock is deeply in love with Luffy and risks her Shichibukai position to help him reach Impel Down to save Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock secretly feeds Luffy on Momonga's warship and fantasizes about taking care of him.

keyMoments.title: Debuts as Torino Kingdom Native
keyMoments.description: Shanba appears as one of the native inhabitants of Torino Kingdom who capture Chopper and plan to make him into 'Tanuki hot pot'.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Shanba, who will later befriend Chopper and help him train in medicine during the two-year timeskip.

abilities.description: Shanba and his tribe use mechanically advanced rocket spears despite their primitive appearance.

relationships.description: Initially hostile to Chopper, attempting to eat him when he first arrives on the island.

evolutionMoments.description: Shanba and the natives capture Chopper and try to cook him.

reveals.information: Shanba is a native of Torino Kingdom, a South Blue island ruled by giant birds
Despite primitive appearance, Shanba's tribe possesses advanced technology like rocket spears and maintains an extensive library

keyMoments.title: Debuts Caring for Sanji
keyMoments.description: Tibany (called Elizabeth in the anime) first appears caring for an unconscious Sanji. Through Sanji's hallucination, Tibany appears as a beautiful, well-endowed young woman.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Tibany, a key resident of the Kamabakka Kingdom who represents the culture shock Sanji experiences on Momoiro Island.

keyMoments.title: True Identity Revealed to Sanji
keyMoments.description: Tibany's true appearance as a large, middle-aged okama with blonde curly hair and stubble is revealed when Sanji's hallucination breaks after being handed a dress.
keyMoments.significance: The reveal that creates Sanji's horrified reaction and establishes the comedic tone of his time on Momoiro Island.

relationships.description: Tibany cares for Sanji when he arrives unconscious on Momoiro Island, then attempts to convert him into an okama by offering him a dress.

evolutionMoments.description: Tibany cares for Sanji and attempts to convert him to okama culture.

reveals.information: Tibany is an okama (cross-dressing man) from Momoiro Island who appears as a beautiful woman in Sanji's hallucination
Tibany is a resident of the Kamabakka Kingdom on Momoiro Island

voiceActors.japanese: Yasuhiko Kawazu (true form), Ai Maeda (fantasy form)

keyMoments.title: Hidden on Momonga's Warship
keyMoments.description: Luffy remains hidden in Hancock's quarters as she smuggles him toward Impel Down on Vice Admiral Momonga's warship. He is secretly fed by Hancock to maintain his strength.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's determination to reach Impel Down to save Ace, and his reliance on Hancock's help to infiltrate the prison.

relationships.description: Hancock helps Luffy reach Impel Down by smuggling him on Momonga's warship and feeding him secretly.

evolutionMoments.description: Hancock continues to help and protect Luffy on the journey to Impel Down.
